            "title": [
              [
                "This example updates last write time of a huge number of files (using "
              ],
              ["System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles", [["c"]]],
              [" instead of "],
              ["System.IO.Directory.GetFiles()", [["c"]]],
              ["). Optionally you can specify a search pattern (default is "],
              ["\"*.*\"", [["c"]]],
              [
                " and eventually search through a directory tree (not only the specified directory):"
              ]
            ]

          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",

          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1551951716706,
          "parent_id": "48889958-66b3-4e91-8ef5-694fe089230d",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "public static void Touch(string path,\n                         string searchPattern = \"*.*\",\n                         SearchOptions options = SearchOptions.None)\n{\n    var now = DateTime.Now;\n\n    foreach (var filePath in Directory.EnumerateFiles(path, searchPattern, options))\n    {\n        File.SetLastWriteTime(filePath, now);\n    }\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
      }
